lines.text: create int array a with 1000002 elements
loop i from 3 to 1000002 exclusive , assign ( a [ i - 1 ] + a [ i - 2 ] + 2 ) % 1000000007 to a [ i ]
loop , reading n from the input and printing a [ n ]
lines.code: while ( cin >> n ) { cout << a [ n ] << endl ; }
